page.title: 16Church Restoration Work
page.content: {Restorations} 1880 Rev F.W.Ragg carvings in Chancel:Trained locals in restoration work. 1977 Nave,Chancel,South Aisle Roofs: East Window:Exterior East front buttress. 1981 Tower s.w. buttresses/parapets. 1985 N.W. butresses(planned) Restoration Appeals generously supported by Marsworth people:Charities;Ministry of Environment. 1985: Flower festival raised over Â£2000 towards restoration. Several groups in the village occasionally join together for combined fund raising activities.e.g.Bridge drives,Barn dances,craft festival,Fashion shows, Antique road shows, Bazaars,fetes, sponsored walks,Social evenings
